Description:
UNITS WALKING DISTANCE TO AMENITIES IN DEMAND
This just listed two bedroom unit is a short walk to the township of Drysdale. Rarely do units come on the market so close to town.
Freshly painted in neutral tones, good functional layout. Everything in easy reach in the kitchen. Neat undercover area at the rear of the unit to sit and read the paper and listen to the birds. Electric heating for the cooler months and a split system to keep you cool in summer. Single garage with remote plus a visitor parking spot. Built with maintenance free cladding and protected by a veranda allows you more time to enjoy the property. There are only three units on the site.
Why Drysdale? Itâs a historic town that lacks nothing that you require for a quiet life. Everything is close and handy including public transport, medical centres, shopping complexes etc. Will suit downsizer or investor.
Come along to an open for inspection or book a private viewing. You wonât be disappointed.

Address: 13-17 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Peace, Privacy & Rare Bay Views
The Feel:
Privately set beyond a mature tree line and enjoying a coveted Clifton Springs address, is a unique buying opportunity combining the privilege of space, with stunning water views across Corio Bay.
The updated 3BR residence boasts a social open plan design thats loaded with potential, with a comfortable and relaxed coastal vibe that comes from living this close to the waters edge.
The Facts:
-Updated 3BR+study single level home set across 3.3 acres approx.
-Bright interiors feature polished concrete flooring and raked ceilings
-Central country kitchen with dw, electric wall oven and induction cooktop
-Lounge with automatic Velux window and cosy gas log fireplace
-Living zone with timber sliding doors accessing an expansive lawn and deck
-Elevated viewing deck offers a peaceful setting to enjoy further views
-Expansive north facing grassed area perfect for children, and horse riding
-Direct access to Beacon Point Reserve, with steps down to the water!
-Enclosed salt-chlorinated in-ground swimming pool with solar heating
-Master BR with WIR and modern ensuite, with access to study/nursery
-BR 2 with access to family bathroom and BR 3 with spacious ensuite
-Passive design captures winter sun and coastal breeze, with SSAC and fans
-DLUG with rear roller-door, fitted shelves and plumbing ideal as a workshop
-2 paddocks with stables, long driveway with dual access ideal for floats/trailers
-Orchard, raised vegie beds and chook pen for a semi self-sufficient lifestyle
-Central Bellarine Peninsula location close to schools, Geelong and Docklands ferry
-Minutes to award-winning wineries, surf beaches, and coastal towns
The Owner Loves.
The open floor space is great for parties, and the sunsets across the Bay are beautiful. We love being steps away from the water, its such a quiet spot and modern conveniences are just up the road!

Address: 10 Sea Haven Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Find Your Haven
Looking directly out onto the neat landscaped front garden, the master suite features a very generous walk in robe and perfectly proportioned ensuite complete with shower, vanity and toilet.
The formal lounge room in the middle of the home separates the main bedroom from the rest of the house, offering a space that could be used for the younger members of the family to enjoy their favourite shows or a retreat for mum and dad. The formal dining room is currently used as a study.
The open plan kitchen, with an Electrolux dishwasher, Simpson stovetop and rangehood for the chef, complementing the spacious dining and lounge areas. Brand new carpet and polished floorboards throughout finish these areas off marvellously, with ducted heating and split system air conditioning to keep the house warm in Winter and cool in Summer.
A central bathroom services two more bedrooms, both with built in robes and more than enough room for the rest of the family.
A covered outdoor area provides space for a barbecue or outdoor setting under shade from the elements, with more room for family and friends to enjoy in the backyard.
A garden shed, double garage and prime position within walking distance to parkland, schools and shops make this home an absolute winner.

Description:
Contemporary Convenience
Quietly nestled amongst quality homes in one of Leopold's most convenient locations is this stunning family home. It has so much to offer and will have you in awe from the moment you enter.
This 4-bedroom, single level home lies on a versatile block and offers not only a quality home but a lifestyle. Moments to the expanding Gateway Plaza, where you'll find great cafes and ample retail stores, and only a short drive from Geelong and the Surf Coast. Your family will enjoy a fun, active lifestyle, as this residence is perfectly positioned within a short walk from public parks, sports oval, soccer pitches and the wetland walking tracks. This wonderful home is an ideal entry into this ever-popular suburb or the perfect investment.
Upon entry you are instantly welcomed by the class this home presents, offering a functional layout that seamlessly flows throughout the home. The fully equipped modern kitchen provides beautiful stainless-steel appliances, stone bench tops, crisp white splash backs and large working surfaces for preparation. The adjoining dining and lounge area are both bright and offer open plan living best utilised for entertaining guests. The second family room is separate and private from the main living area, posing a peaceful and secluded living space for the kids to enjoy. The master bedroom being very spacious and privately positioned is the perfect retreat - with a beautiful ensuite, double vanity and walk in robe. The further 3 bedrooms are equipped with built in robes and are accompanied by a central bathroom.
All the hard work is done with fully landscaped gardens and a large outdoor entertaining area, perfect for those family functions. Extra features of this stunning family home include ducted gas heating, evaporative air-conditioning, double garage and a garden shed for extra storage.
Perfectly positioned where the ever-expanding Gateway Shopping Centre, Leopold Primary School are just minutes' away and with easy access to the Geelong CBD and the many amenities of the Bellarine Peninsula, this property will truly impress. What an opportunity to secure yourself a unique home in a peaceful and well-established location. Call now to inspect!

Description:
Spacious Family Living With Solar-Heated Pool & Separate Studio!
Occupying approx. 1254m2, this property presents buyers with a world of possibilities! The family home features a solar-heated pool and four-car garage, while the front studio is ideal for home business owners or as separate living quarters!
With the Bellarine Rail Trail just footsteps from your front door, the whole family will be inspired to venture outdoors. Public transport and the Leopold Sportsmans Club are also a short stroll away, while families will appreciate that Leopold P.S and the Leopold Community Centre are within easy reach. To top it all off, the Gateway Plaza provides you with an abundance of shopping and dining options.
Raked timber ceilings and exposed brick walls add character to the interiors, which soak up the western light. The lounge welcomes you into the home, while the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone flows onto the alfresco deck. Both living zones create a wealth of space for the whole family to enjoy, with a bay window highlighting the dining area.
The kitchen features a walk-in pantry, breakfast bar, and stainless steel appliances (Bosch dishwasher, F&P double wall oven, 900mm gas cooktop, and rangehood).
The Master Bedroom boasts external access to the side of the home, along with a walk-in robe and en suite. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, while the laundry and separate toilet complete the layout.
Ducted heating, two split-system air conditioners, and ceiling fans keep you in the utmost comfort. Ample storage is another huge plus.
Outside, the sheltered alfresco deck wraps around the north and western sides of the home. Complete with a bar area and TV connection, this outdoor zone sets the scene for lively gatherings with family and friends. The lawn creates a generous play space for children and pets, while the salt-chlorinated pool will provide hours of endless entertainment.
A veggie garden and garden shed add the final touches to the backyard.
The lock-up garage accommodates four vehicles, with the rear roller door providing vehicle access to the backyard - perfect for those looking to store caravans, boats, or trailers.
Zoned to the front of the property, the separate studio offers immense versatility. The main area is currently set up as a hairdresser's studio, while the bedroom with built-in robes and combined bathroom/laundry complete the layout. If you're looking for a great place to set up a home business, artist's studio, or even a teen retreat, this space will effortlessly accommodate. It also offers an excellent place for family members to enjoy their independence while still being close to the main home. Other features of the studio inc. a split-system air conditioner, ceiling fan, Foxtel/ TV connection, and separate hot water system (approx. 12-months-old).
Ticking every box for a great lifestyle, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this Leopold gem! Inspect ASAP!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
FAMILY HOME in CENTRAL DRYSDALE 1160m2
This established home in the heart of Drysdale will provide the enjoyment of spacious gardens on a large block whilst having the future potential to subdivide STCA. An abundance of yard space for the young, growing family or the avid retiree gardener. Beautiful mature trees shade the gardens. Situated around the corner from the Drysdale Primary School and 5 minutes walk to the local shopping centre. All services at your finger tips !
The home is of solid construction comprising 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and 2 living zones. Looking for a home for extended family to have their own bed-sitter ? Then look no further.
Modern stone bench tops, neutral floor coverings and quality window furnishings have been added.
Generous bedrooms with ample robe space, gas space heating and split system are all features of the home.
The outdoor spa is serviced and ready for the warmer weather to come.
Parking options galore with a single over-sized single garage, double carport and room to build a workshop or shedding at the rear. Properties of this size are rare close to all amenities. Call the agent to inspect now !

Description:
Stop Looking, Weve Found It For You.
Imagine calling this your own, move in and enjoy all that this has to offer. Positioned in a well-established and highly sought-after pocket of Leopold is this immaculately presented, family friendly, heritage home.
The flexible floorplan offers 4 sizeable bedrooms (or study), main comprising walk in robe and full ensuite, while remaining bedrooms have built in robes and utilise the central bathroom and separate toilet.
Located at the front of the home is the sunlit and fully carpeted formal lounge area/ kids retreat, separated from open plan kitchen, dining and second living area. The kitchen will fulfil the fussiest of buyers needs, offering quality appliances, an abundance of storage and bench space.
The floorplan inside is completed by a full laundry with external access. Further features include ducted heating throughout, split system cooling and ceiling fans in bedrooms, creating comfort to the home all year round.
Outside is sure to impress, complimented by an enormous outdoor entertaining area potentially acting as a third living area with alfresco blinds, wood fire heater and ceiling fan enabling you to enjoy the space in any kinds of weather. Immaculately well-maintained gardens complete the rear yard and a childs dream playground making them the envy of the neighbourhood.
The backyard also offers drive through access from the double garage, leading to accommodation for caravans, boats or trailers, keeping your assets completely secure.
Being just moments away from Leopold Primary School and the ever-expanding Gateway Plaza this location will leave you wanting nothing more. An inspection on this property is a must, dont miss out!

Description:
Stunning 5BR Home On One Acre (approx)
The Feel:
Set on a private one acre allotment bordered by established Gum Trees, this stunning 5BR home has the wow factor! Designed to take advantage of its desirable north orientation, the beautifully executed design wraps around the sunny gardens, outdoor entertaining areas and swimming pool, showcasing an unbelievably high standard in family living. A must to inspect.
The Facts:
-Soaring ceilings amplify the OP living, kitchen and meals
-High end apps, butlers pantry and stone benchtops within
-Complete north aspect, welcoming natural sunlight
-Dbl door access to the outdoors with built in entertaining
-Outdoor kitchen with pizza oven, bbq and wine fridge
-Solar heated swimming pool and childrens playground
-Huge master suite with WIR and five star ensuite
-3 further BRs occupy this wing, with BIRs and desks
-Privatised 5th BR with flexibility for office/gym use
-Oversized main bathroom and additional powder room
-Customised joinery throughout the entire home
-Polished concrete floors with hydronic slab heating
-R/C air conditioning acclimates the home in Summer
-Heightened ceilings and glazing amplify interior space
-DLUG and 4 bay shed to accommodate vehicle overflow
-Security system with cameras and electric gate access
-Placed to the rear, allowing privacy, peace and quiet
-A short distance to the Gateway Plaza for practical needs
-Easily accessible to public transport, schools and childcare
-A fantastic family home, simply move in and enjoy!
The Owner Loves.
We love how our home has been designed to wrap around the beautiful north facing yard, allowing natural light and sunshine to flood the home, while being able to watch the children play outside from any room. Its very quiet and serene here, like your own private resort.

Description:
Exceptional Views with an Abundance of Space
This is your chance to secure a spacious family home on an impressive allotment of 862m2 (approx.). With spectacular 180-degree views across the bay and over Geelong, while being only minutes from all that Leopold offers.
Nestled in a peaceful court location, this brick veneer home has been well loved and maintained over the years. The original interior allows for a blank canvas when creating your dream home. The split-level floorplan offers convenience and very functional family living arrangements.
The bottom level is home to the living, dining and kitchen zone, which is a perfect space for the whole family to gather. The kitchen is well equipped with a dishwasher, stainless steel wall oven and gas cooktop. A second separate lounge, three additional bedrooms, plus study, and the main bathroom also occupy the lower level, all bedrooms are complete with built-in robes.
Upstairs acts as a quiet parent retreat area. With the exceptionally roomy main bedroom featuring a large walk-in robe and private ensuite, as well as private retreat/3rd living space. With glass sliding door access to the alfresco deck, you'll love basking in the sun while relishing the gorgeous views.
A wood fire place is sure to keep you warm in the cooler months and provide modern comfort. The secure backyard offers an abundance of space for children and pets to run freely. Offering a large lock up garage/workshop, as well as high double carport perfect for the storage of an extra car, boat, trailer or a caravan.
Growing families are taken care of with kindergartens and Leopold Primary School just a stones throwaway. While easy access to public transport and the Gateway Plaza is another plus to this family-focused location.
An inspection is truly a must, propertys like this dont present themselves very often!

Description:
An Abundance of Space for the Whole Family
Nestled in a quiet pocket of Leopold, this brick veneer, family home puts the elements in place for charming lifestyle! The convenient floorplan has it all; with an exceptionally well planned and organized layout to suit everyday living.
The expansive Gateway Plaza is within close proximity - placing cafes, eateries, and big brand stores right at your fingertips. Growing families are taken great care of with Leopold Kindergarten and Leopold Primary School at easy reach, public transport is conveniently close by, while easy access to the Leopold Community Hub, Gateway Sanctuary, and local sporting grounds is an added bonus.
The freshly painted interiors are in immaculate condition. The main bedroom offers busy parents a private retreat. The walk-in robe provides ample storage, while the private ensuite is complete with a shower, single vanity, and toilet. Three additional bedrooms offer built-in robes and utilise the main bathroom and separate toilet.
The front lounge creates a peaceful spot to relax, while the spacious open plan living zone is bathed in an abundance of natural light. The kitchen features a large built-in pantry, stainless steel appliances including; a built-in oven, gas cooktop, rangehood, and dishwasher, as well as the large island bench/ breakfast bar. Completing the floorplan inside is a spacious laundry and ideal study nook.
The outdoor alfresco area puts the elements in place for both everyday living and lively gatherings of family and friends. Occupying 633m2 approx., the low maintenance and secure yard is perfect for the kids and pets to enjoy. The garden shed and large water tank adds a practical touch.
Added extras include ducted heating, split system cooling x2, downlights and the double remote lock-up garage with internal access.
If youre looking for a beautiful home to raise your family, then this property is the perfect choice! Be sure to put this one on your list!

Description:
Complete Family Package
Desirably located in one of Leopolds most sought after pockets and underpinned by a large 737sqm allotment (apporx). This genuine family home has responded exceptionally well to a modern and tasteful update throughout and enjoys an outstanding lifestyle between the stunning Bellarine Peninsula and Geelong CBD.
The expansive layout begins with the open plan formal living and dining area that is filled with natural light. Step through from here to a large central kitchen complete with ample bench space, updated appliances and great storage space. This overlooks the second living and meals area, providing so much flexibility for the growing family.
Step outside from here to embrace a sun soaked entertaining area; this flows seamlessly out to the big backyard for kids and pets. There is also scope to build a pergola, if you so desire. (STCA)
Certain to impress is the massive 7.3m x 9.0 shed with its own side access from the street, perfect for those needing additional space for boats, trailers, caravan or multiple cars. It also couples as a great entertaining area.
Completing the home is three well-sized bedrooms, the master complete with its own ensuite and WIR and split system. The other two bedrooms have BIRs and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Features include:
Double garage
7.3m x 9.0m shed
Ducted heating
2 x Split system A/C
Truly a great family home in a well established family locale. Within walking distance to Leopold Primary School and only moments from the Leopold Shopping centre that caters to your entire daily needs.

Description:
Stylish, Roomy and ready to go!
This lovely 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, home with Triple lock up garage has everything you will need and more. Fully renovated and sitting on 674m2 it provides a light, airy stylish look that will appeal to many. Comprising a neat entry it opens to the large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge with a study nook just around the corner. Decorated in a neutral pallet it features hardwood floors through the dining and kitchen. The lounge has carpet and large windows which make it a light filled space. The bedrooms are located at the front of the home and all have hardwood floors. 2 bedrooms are serviced by a stunning central bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, deep bath, large shower recess and vanity. The master has an ensuite with large shower recess with twin rainfall shower roses and a large vanity. The main also features a walk in robe with drawers and shelving. To the rear Sliding doors lead out to a fantastic alfresco with spotted gum deck. Steps lead to a grassed area and low maintenance garden. Also at the rear is a garage which can accommodate up to 3 cars with space for a workshop. Climate control is provided via underfloor gas heating and evaporative cooling. With the stakes in Leopold continuing to rise and with all this property offers this really is an attractive package for investors or owner occupiers. You'll need to be quick to inspect this one as it won't last!
Rental return estimate $400 pw

Description:
Renovated ripper!
LAST CHANCE TO BUY Monday 24 Feb @ midday.
Walking distance to a number of parks, shops and the Bellarine Rail Trail, this magnificent family home has been beautifully renovated by an equally beautiful family and could be yours in 30 days!
You'll love the oversized lounge room, dwarfed only by the pergola that runs almost the entire length of the house! Bifold doors extend the kitchen and dining space superbly to help accommodate the family get-togethers, while those stuck in the kitchen will enjoy having line-of-site to the backyard - complete with lush green grass and cubby house.
The sitting room/study off the kitchen and living is a great little space for the kids to get their homework done while you prepare dinner, or you just want to sit and enjoy some morning light.
Your master bedroom is complete with WIR and ensuite, while your kids or guests will share a central bathroom with separate toilet.
The oversized single garage can comfortably accommodate one car AND all that 'stuff' you have, while two other offstreet parks are perfect for the second car or visitor. There's also a massive linen closet / storage wall inside too, so don't think you have to keep it all out there!
Stop reading and start calling - this won't last long!

Description:
RURAL RETREAT FIT FOR A FAMILY
Escape the city hustle and bustle at your own Bellarine rural retreat, complete with an orchard, elevator, games room with billiard table, sauna and spa.
The 1908sqm property is ready-made for a family seeking a tree-change lifestyle.
Along with loads of room for kids to run free, theres a creek at the bottom of the block with a walking track and a 15m x 6m garage, plus outdoor parking area, to house any number of boys toys, such as cars, motorbikes, boats and a caravan.
One the main level, the double-storey house has space to spread out, with four bedrooms, master ensuite and central bathroom, huge kitchen, dining and living zone, plus formal lounge.
The kitchen, with large butlers pantry and quality appliances, is at the centre of the action, overlooking the family living area with a welcoming open fire.
Take the custom-built elevator or stairs down to a getaway area featuring the pool room, bar, undercover spa and sauna, family laundry and a double garage.
When the great outdoors beckons, step from the top level onto a massive undercover wrap-around deck, fitted with electric shutters, fans and gas heaters to suit any weather.
As a bonus, a barbecue on the deck (connected to the household gas) forms part of the property sale, along with the pool table.
Further afield is a man cave to die for fitted with roller doors, workshop and storage area, toilet and wood heater.
The orchard is a fruit lovers delight, boasting produce including avocadoes, plums, apricots, nectarines, apples, cherries, lemons, pecans, macadamias and mulberries.
Other highlights include split-system heating and cooling, walk-in and built-in robes, ducted vacuuming, double-glazed windows at the front of the house, rainwater tanks, 12 x Solar Panels and a chicken run.
The property is close to sport at Drysdale Reserve, picturesque McLeods Waterholes Reserve, central shopping, well-regarded schools, including St Ignatius College, Christian College and Bellarine Secondary College, popular wineries, golf courses and beaches.

Description:
Sensational Family Entertainer!
Nestled in one of Leopolds most sought-after pockets, this residence ticks every box for sensational family living! The spacious layout provides superb entertainment options, while ample off-street parking is another huge plus!
The Bellarine Rail Trail is within close walking distance from your front door, along with the Highland Milk Bar and Leopold Sportsmans Club. Easy access to Leopold P.S and the Leopold Community Centre takes care of families, while the nearby Gateway Plaza provides an abundance of shopping and dining options.
A double door entrance welcomes you into the home, while polished floorboards and high ceilings enrich the elegant interiors. The spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen zone unites with both the sheltered patio and enclosed alfresco creating endless entertaining options for year-round enjoyment! The kitchen exudes quality with stone benchtops, Miele dishwasher, 1200mm St George oven with combined gas/electric cooktop, and Qaisair canopy rangehood. The island bench/breakfast bar, built-in pantry, and powerpoint bank puts the practical elements in place. With the kitchens bi-fold window opening onto the enclosed alfresco, entertaining has never been easier.
A double barn door opens onto the Cinema Room, which will impress with a surround sound system, projector, and screen. Just add popcorn and youre set for a fun-filled movie night in!
Zoned to the front of the home, the large Master Bedroom offers a peaceful retreat for parents. The walk-in robe is wonderfully generous, while the en suite features a shower, single vanity, and separate toilet. The study with built-in cabinetry, laundry, and powder room complete the lower level.
The winding timber staircase makes a graceful statement as it leads to the upper level. The upstairs rumpus room showcases elevated views that capture sparkling bay waters, while the front bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe and private balcony. Two additional bedrooms (one with walk-in robe, one with built-in robes) share close access to the main bathroom and powder room. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, gas log fireplace, video intercom, ducted vacuum, solar panels, and a rainwater tank.
Home to lush lawn, a fishpond, chook pen, and impressive cat run, the secure backyard creates a private wonderland for children and adults alike. The remote double lock-up garage provides rear vehicle access to the large work shed, while secure parking is also offered for a caravan or boat.
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace blissful family living in a prized pocket of Leopold! Inspection will delight!

Description:
Perfect in so Many Ways
Fall in love with this home, the moment you step through the door. Positioned in a peaceful and well-established pocket of Leopold, ideal living for a first home buyer, young family, downsizer or an opportunity to secure the perfect investment property. The instant comfort and appeal of this home, complimented by its peaceful, yet superbly central location, will ensure this residence is a talking point amongst buyers.
Situated on a 787m2 approx. allotment, this immaculately maintained family home could be the one! Offering three generous sized bedrooms, main complete with ceiling fan, walk in robe and private ensuite. The remaining bedrooms also feature ceiling fans, built in robes and utilise the main central bathroom with freestanding claw foot bathtub and separate toilet.
The convenient layout of this floorplan incorporates two separate living areas. The spacious & private front lounge greets you upon entry, making you feel right home. It is a perfect space for the kids to enjoy. The classy kitchen offers plentiful bench space, a gas cooktop, electric built in oven and stainless-steel dishwasher that will entice any budding chef. Overlooking the dining, second living and outdoor entertaining area ensuring that entertaining is a breeze, indoors and out.
Completing this ideal property is the enormous, paved undercover entertaining area with built in pizza oven and bench. As far as alfrescos go, this is certainly impressive, perfect for enjoying those summer nights with family and friends. The rear yard also offers a large 6m x 7.5m second shed/ workshop, in addition to the remote double garage with drive through access. The stunning gardens that surround you will leave you feeling as though you are living in your own oasis, the lush lawn and abundance of yard space is waiting to be enjoyed by all.
Added features include gas ducted heating throughout, split system cooling, water tank and a cubby house, making the kids the envy of all their friends.
This home simply caters for all! Certain to please both investment buyers and those looking for a new residence, this property is every bit as good as it looks from the street. Within extremely close proximity to Leopold Primary school, Gateway Plaza, walking tracks, parks and bike trails. Public transport only a moment away. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!

Description:
Everything on your Doorstep
Positioned on a very generous allotment of 642m2 approx & zoned RGZ (Residential Growth Zone Schedule 2). This solid brick home presents a fantastic opportunity for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor alike. Ideally located on the corner of Dorothy Street and Cornthwaite Crescent, with the Dorothy Street shopping stirp right on your door step, public transport easily accessible and only a short drive to the Gateway Plaza.
Offering three bedrooms, one bathroom, a large living area and a double garage ready for a new owner to provide some tender love, whether you are looking to move straight in, rent out, to renovate or to develop (STCA). Boasting solid timber floorboards throughout this home could be something special.
The main living area showcases an abundance of natural light flowing through the large feature window, heated by a stone framed gas heater. The adjoining dining area overlooks the functional kitchen offering ample storage, electric cooking and step in pantry. The bedrooms located at the rear of the home, all provide convenient built in robes and are serviced by the central bathroom with separate toilet.
Other highlight features of the home are a private and secure rear yard with undercover area, separate laundry, ceiling fans in all bedrooms and a workshop are in the garage.
This is a great home has an abundance of possibilities, dont miss your opportunity to secure!

Description:
Clifton Springs Charm
This delightful residence boasts one of the warmest, welcoming 'feels' imaginable! An attractive street appeal creates an anticipation for what is sure to be a memorable inspection.
All the modern comforts, beautifully light and bright, modernised kitchen/bathrooms, wonderfully expansive brick paved alfresco provides a wonderful vantage point to admire a 'pretty as a picture' garden setting and a garage/workshop (complete with remote control). If you desire the ultimate 'turnkey', 'nothing to do' and 'enjoy from day one' prospect this home has your name on it!
Three bedrooms; master complete with modernised ensuite and walk in robe
A beautifully appointed kitchen, contemporary appliances, custom cabinetry, expansive bench space and excellent storage solutions
A wonderfully light and bright primary living area; huge north facing window promotes an abundance of natural light an inviting space to take in a cup of tea and soak up the warmth from the morning sun
All the modern comforts; ducted heating/cooling, new carpets, freshly painted. Slate floors, timber decking, exposed aggregate drive-way and external blinds just to name a few of the fine inclusions
A prime land holding of 585m2 (approx) within a tranquil green leafy pocket of Clifton Springs completes a very pretty picture
As delightful as this home is, I personally believe that its impressive surrounds sets it apart from others in the market place; mature trees flank the boundaries creating a welcomed seclusion, productive veggie patches and selection of fruits trees, a family/pet friendly secure rear yard, rain water tanks, brick paved sheltered alfresco and an expansive garage and defined work shop.

Description:
Convenient Living Doesnt Get Much Better Than This!
When it comes to convenient living, this home packs a punch! Whether youre dreaming of owning your first home, searching for a terrific investment property, or looking to downsize in a peaceful pocket of Leopold, this home is the one for you!
With public transport and local sporting grounds positioned a short stroll from your front door, this location comes hand-in-hand with a carefree lifestyle. The estates playground and BBQ area are also within easy walking distance, while a short drive will find you at the popular Gateway Plaza. Both Lake Connewarre and the Gateway Sanctuary will inspire you to connect back with nature.
The front lounge welcomes you into the home, while the generous open plan living zone flows onto the rear sunroom creating an enticing setting for everyday living! With sliding doors uniting the sunroom with the compact backyard, youll love that this light-filled zone sets the scene for year-round enjoyment. The kitchen makes a stylish statement with white cabinetry, white stone benchtops, and a black glass splashback. The built-in pantry provides ample storage, while stainless steel appliances include an Omega dishwasher and 900mm Westinghouse oven, gas hob, rangehood.
The Master Bedroom is graced with plantation shutters, a walk-in robe, and en suite with a large shower. Three additional bedrooms with mirrored built-in robes share close access to the bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry is complete with storage and external access. Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fans.
Home to mod grass, the backyard is wonderfully low-maintenance. The remote double lock-up garage with internal access provides secure parking. With so much to offer, youll need to inspect without delay!

Description:
Stylish Family Residence With Large Work Shed!
Occupying approx. 720m2, every inch of this family residence will astound! The quality interiors exude on-trend style, while vehicle access to the rear work shed will impress tradies!
Ideally positioned in a quiet cul de sac, this location places you footsteps away from the Bellarine Rail Trail. Leopold Primary School and the Leopold Community Hub are within close reach, along with the Gateway Plaza and local sporting grounds. The Portarlington Highway grants easy access to the delights of both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
Approx. five years old, youll love that this home feels brand sparkling new. High, square-set ceilings enhance the sleek interiors, along with porcelain floor tiles and tall doorframes. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates a central retreat for the whole family to enjoy, while opening onto the sheltered alfresco for effortless entertaining options. The family room is ideal for children and teens, while the front lounge provides a calming spot to kick back and relax. The kitchen will impress cooking enthusiasts with stone benchtops, an expansive walk-in pantry, and SMEG stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, rangehood). The smoked mirror splashback makes a stylish statement.
Overlooking the front garden, the spacious Master Bedroom creates a private oasis for parents. The walk-in robe is wonderfully spacious, while the large en suite is graced with a large shower, dual vanity with stone benchtops, and separate toilet. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the elegant main bathroom and separate toilet. The study features a built-in desk, while the large laundry boasts ample storage and external access. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling keep you comfortable in all seasons.
Soaking up the northern sunlight, the backyard creates a secure play space for children and pets alike. The oversized remote double lock-up garage features internal access, plus a tall roller door and rear roller door for caravan access. A driveway connects the front garage to the powered work shed, which features two roller doors for additional vehicle storage.
Putting every element in place for an exceptional family lifestyle, youll need to act swiftly to secure this sensational home! Inspect ASAP!
